title: Regular graphs
content: With ~ df-rgr and ~ df-rusgr , k-regularity of a (simple) graph is defined as predicate ` RegGraph ` resp. ` RegUSGraph `. Instead of defining a predicate, an alternative could have been to define a function that maps an extended nonnegative integer to the class of "graphs" in which every vertex has the extended nonnegative integer as degree: ` RegGraph = ( k e. NN0* |-> { g | A. v e. ( Vtx `` g ) ( ( VtxDeg `` g ) `` v ) = k } ) ` . This function, however, would not be defined at least for ` k = 0 ` (see ~ rgrx0nd ), because ` { g | A. v e. ( Vtx `` g ) ( ( VtxDeg `` g ) `` v ) = 0 } ` is not a set (see ~ rgrprcx ). It is expected that this function is not defined for every ` k e. NN0* ` (how could this be proven?).

df-rgr
blocks.content: Define the "k-regular" predicate, which is true for a "graph" being k-regular: read ` G RegGraph K ` as " ` G ` is ` K `-regular" or " ` G ` is a ` K `-regular graph". Note that ` K ` is allowed to be positive infinity ( ` K e. NN0* ` ), as proposed by GL. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 26-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: df-rusgr
blocks.content: Define the "k-regular simple graph" predicate, which is true for a simple graph being k-regular: read ` G RegUSGraph K ` as ` G ` is a ` K `-regular simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 18-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: isrgr
blocks.content: The property of a class being a k-regular graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 26-Dec-2020.)

thm isrgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, crgr, c2), wa(wcel(c2, cxnn0), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cvtxdg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, crgr, c2), wa(wcel(c2, cxnn0), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wcel(c2, cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2))))
  brabga(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, crgr, wa(wcel(c2, cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2)))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cxnn0), wcel(c2, cxnn0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, cxnn0)
  raleqbidv(s0, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs1)), cfv(cvtx, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs1)), cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c0, cvtx)
  eqeq12d(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0))))
  fveq1d(cfv(cvtxdg, cv(hs1)), cv(s0), cfv(cvtxdg, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c0, cvtxdg)
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  df-rgr(hs1, hs0, s0)
  anbi2d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2)), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2)), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c2))))
  bicomi(wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2)), wral(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c2)))
  raleqbii(s0, c4, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2))
  eqeq1i(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)))
  fveq1i(c5, cv(s0), cfv(cvtxdg, c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c2, cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c2, cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), cv(s0)), c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm isrgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[RegGraph]c2 ↔(c2 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c4,(c5 ` s0)= c2))))
  ⊣ c4 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(VtxDeg ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c0[RegGraph]c2, (c2 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c4,(c5 ` s0)= c2)), (c2 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` c0),((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2)))
  brabga(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, crgr, (c2 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` c0),((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2)), (hs0 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` hs1),((VtxDeg ` hs1)` s0)= hs0)))
  anbi12d((hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), hs0 ∈ ℕ0*, ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` hs1),((VtxDeg ` hs1)` s0)= hs0), c2 ∈ ℕ0*, ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` c0),((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2))
  adantl(hs1 = c0, hs0 = c2, (hs0 ∈ ℕ0* ↔ c2 ∈ ℕ0*))
  eleq1(hs0, c2, cxnn0)
  raleqbidv(s0, (Vtx ` hs1), (Vtx ` c0), (hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), ((VtxDeg ` hs1)` s0)= hs0, ((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2)
  adantr(hs1 = c0, hs0 = c2, (Vtx ` hs1)=(Vtx ` c0))
  fveq2(hs1, c0, cvtx)
  eqeq12d(((VtxDeg ` hs1)` s0), hs0, ((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0), c2, (hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  adantr(hs1 = c0, hs0 = c2, ((VtxDeg ` hs1)` s0)=((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0))
  fveq1d((VtxDeg ` hs1), s0, (VtxDeg ` c0), hs1 = c0)
  fveq2(hs1, c0, cvtxdg)
  simpr(hs1 = c0, hs0 = c2)
  df-rgr(hs1, hs0, s0)
  anbi2d((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c2 ∈ ℕ0*, ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` c0),((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c4,(c5 ` s0)= c2))
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` c0),((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c4,(c5 ` s0)= c2)))
  bicomi(∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` c0),((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c4,(c5 ` s0)= c2))
  raleqbii(s0, c4, (Vtx ` c0), (c5 ` s0)= c2, ((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2)
  eqeq1i((c5 ` s0), c2, ((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0))
  fveq1i(c5, s0, (VtxDeg ` c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w((c2 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` c0),((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2)))
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` c0),((VtxDeg ` c0)` s0)= c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs1 = c0, hs0 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rgrprop
blocks.content: The properties of a k-regular graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 26-Dec-2020.)

thm rgrprop(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, crgr, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cxnn0), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtxdg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpcom(wbr(c0, crgr, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cxnn0), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  bropaex12(hs1, hs0, c0, crgr, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxnn0), wral(s0, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  df-rgr(hs1, hs0, s0)
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wbr(c0, crgr, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cxnn0), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))))
  isrgr(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, c2, c3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm rgrprop(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0[RegGraph]c1 →(c1 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c3 ` s0)= c1)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(VtxDeg ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpcom(c0[RegGraph]c1, (c1 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c3 ` s0)= c1)), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  bropaex12(hs1, hs0, c0, crgr, c1, (hs0 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(Vtx ` hs1),((VtxDeg ` hs1)` s0)= hs0)))
  df-rgr(hs1, hs0, s0)
  biimpd((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), c0[RegGraph]c1, (c1 ∈ ℕ0* ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c3 ` s0)= c1)))
  isrgr(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, c2, c3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isrusgr
blocks.content: The property of being a k-regular simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 18-Dec-2020.)

thm isrusgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, crusgr, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(c0, crgr, c2))))
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, crusgr, wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(c0, crgr, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cusgr), wbr(cv(hs0), crgr, cv(hs1))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cusgr), wbr(cv(hs0), crgr, cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(c0, crgr, c2))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cusgr), wcel(c0, cusgr)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cusgr)
  breq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c2, crgr)
  df-rusgr(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(c0, crgr, c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(c0, crgr, c2)))
}

thm isrusgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[RegUSGraph]c2 ↔(c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c0[RegGraph]c2)))
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, crusgr, (c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c0[RegGraph]c2), (hs0 ∈ USGraph ∧ hs0[RegGraph]hs1))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), hs0 ∈ USGraph, hs0[RegGraph]hs1, c0 ∈ USGraph, c0[RegGraph]c2)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (hs0 ∈ USGraph ↔ c0 ∈ USGraph))
  eleq1(hs0, c0, cusgr)
  breq12(hs0, c0, hs1, c2, crgr)
  df-rusgr(hs0, hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
